main event: A UFO sighting involving 5 unidentified objects that were stationary in the sky for 6 to 7 minutes was reported in Fostoria, Ohio.
interesting points: The observer noted that the object was virtually motionless and silent., There was no record of ability to substantiate conclusions about the objects., The sighting was officially recorded by Project Blue Book, a U.S. Air Force program., Physical evidence related to the sighting was noted., The observer described the object as metallic with a silvery color, resembling high polished aluminum.
witness description: A 15-year-old male resident of Fostoria, Ohio
